# Sin

```
// Style only component
const style = s`
  background tomato
`
```

```
// Style input component
s((shadow) => s`
  background tomato
  box-shadow ${ shadow }
`)
```

```
// Style and attr component
s((title, onchange) => s`
  background tomato
`({
  onclick: onchange
}, title))
```

```
// Statefull
s(() => (title, onchange) => s`
  background tomato
`({
  onclick: onchange
}, title))
```
